name: Dolphin Bodyguard | Prototype
description:
You are a dolphin bodyguard and must protect the dolphin president as he takes a lift to the penguin ambassador. Bad penguins want to stop you.  Not everyone likes dolphins!

Keep the president safe.

Keyboard/Mouse Controls:

Move: WASD/Arrow Keys

Dig: Click, Ctrl, Z

Jump: Space, Shift

Controller Controls:

Move: Left Stick

Dig: Right Bumper, Right Trigger

Jump: A/X

1 keyboard/mouse player and 4 controllers are supported
